findings.title: Inability to Withdraw Staked Tokens
findings.description: Users cannot withdraw funds due to certain conditions such as owners enabling whitelist and non-whitelisted users being restricted.

findings.title: Owners can destroy the contract with users' funds
findings.description: The owners of the contract have the ability to destroy it, potentially resulting in loss of users' funds.

findings.title: _amount can be greater than info.borrowed
findings.description: info.borrowed should be subtracted from totalBorrowed instead of _amount when _amount is greater

findings.title: Unused Variable _shares
findings.description: The _shares variable is not used and can be removed.
